conclusion: Trace the path of liquid from each starting point through baffles to determine the container it flows into.
Liquid from A flows downwards along the green baffle.
Liquid from A hits the white baffle and is directed to the left.
Liquid from A flows into the pink container labeled E.
Liquid from B flows downwards along the yellow baffle.
Liquid from B hits the white baffle and is directed to the left.
Liquid from B flows into the white container labeled F.
Liquid from C flows downwards along the orange baffle.
Liquid from C hits the brown baffle and is directed to the right.
Liquid from C flows into the blue container labeled G.
Liquid from D flows downwards along the pink baffle.
Liquid from D hits the green baffle and is directed to the right.
Liquid from D flows into the green container labeled H.
Final answer: Liquid from A flows into container E, B into F, C into G, and D into H.
